<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>

let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() || {})['æ‰‹åŠ¨ç™»å½•Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(xGorgon("multi-detail", "book_id=" + i.join(","), null, ck))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "æœªåˆ†ç»„": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["æœªåˆ†ç»„"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(xGorgon("multi-detail", "book_id=" + i.join(","), null, ck))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = xGorgon(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32&device_id=1024&device_type=114514&iid=2048",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index]
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(tab))
  tab = tab.cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
</js>

<js>

let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() || {})['æ‰‹åŠ¨ç™»å½•Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(xGorgon("multi-detail", "book_id=" + i.join(","), null, ck))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "æœªåˆ†ç»„": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["æœªåˆ†ç»„"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(xGorgon("multi-detail", "book_id=" + i.join(","), null, ck))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = xGorgon(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32&device_id=983439455833884&device_type=NJOKZ75&iid=983439455837980",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index]
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(tab))
  tab = tab.cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
</js>

if (res.url) {

let books

if (res.search_tabs) {
  res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
    if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
  })
} else books = res.data

let results = []

let a = Array.isArray(books) ? books : [books]
a.forEach(w => {
  results.push((w.book_data || [])[0] || [w][0])
})

JSON.stringify(results)

function getBookIdFull(url) {
	const {java} = this
	$ = JSON.parse(url).data
	if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
		arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("è·å– book_id å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½ å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦ç™»å½•ï¼")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['æ‰‹åŠ¨ç™»å½•Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

let arrB = []
for (let i of JSON.parse(book_shelf_info).data.book_shelf_info) {
  arrB.push(i.book_id)
}
write_config('bookshelf.' + read_config('userinfo.userid'), arrB)

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.key + "/multi-detail?bookid=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)
let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "ç»„å¤–": []
  }
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "ç»„å¤–"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "ç»„å¤–"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["ç»„å¤–"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.key + "/multi-detail?bookid=" + i.join(","))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_list || result.book_info || result.data.result || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data })

let replaceCover = (u) => {
    if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
    else u = u.substring(7)

    uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"

    uArr.forEach((x) => {

        else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
    })
    u = uArr2.join("/")
    return u
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var token = source.getLoginHeader();
update(baseUrl, token);
var value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable());
var get = /^[1-9]$/.test(value) ? value : '1';
var config = {
    1: 'sakuraParagraphs',
    2: 'gptParagraphs',
    3: 'youdaoParagraphs',
    4: 'baiduParagraphs',
    5: 'paragraphs'
};
var data = JSON.parse(result);
var content = data[config[get]] || data[config[1]] || data[config[2]] || data[config[3]] || data[config[4]] || data[config[5]];
if (['6', '7', '8', '9'].includes(get)) {
    var cnContent = data[config[1]] || data[config[2]] || data[config[3]] || data[config[4]];
    var jpContent = data[config[5]];
    if (cnContent) {
        if (['8', '9'].includes(get)) {
            var res = java.post(
                'https://static.kksk.io/api/kanji',
                JSON.stringify({"content": format(regex(jpContent))}),
                {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
            );
            var kanji = JSON.parse(res.body());
            jpContent = jpContent.map(text => annotate(text, kanji));
        }
        var type = ['6', '8'].includes(get);
        content = jpContent.flatMap((jp, i) => {
            if (!((jp || '').trim() && (cnContent[i] || '').trim())) return [];
            var pair = type ? [cnContent[i], jp] : [jp, cnContent[i]];
            return pair.filter(Boolean).concat(i === jpContent.length - 1 ? [] : '\u200B');
        }).filter(Boolean);
    } else {
        content = jpContent;
    }
}
format(regex(content));
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
var providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:books\d?\.fishhawk\.top|n\.novelia\.cc)\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
var url;
for (var provider in providers) {
    var match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        var providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        var novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    }
}
if (!url) {
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
}
url;
</js>

headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {

  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

  category()
}else {
  tag()
}

<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
    const {java} = this
    $ = JSON.parse(url).data
    if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
        arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
    } else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
        arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
    } else {
        java.toast("è·å– book_id å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½ å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦ç™»å½•ï¼")
    }
    return arr
}

let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['æ‰‹åŠ¨ç™»å½•Token'])

getShelf = () => {
    let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
    let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
        headers: {
            'Cookie': ck
        }
    }))

    bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
    let id_list = splitArray(bid, 200)
    let urls = []
    id_list.forEach(i => {
        urls.push(getServerHost() +"/detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
    })

    res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

    let resp = {book_info: []}
    res.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
    })

    return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
    let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

    let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
        headers: {
            'Cookie': ck,
        }
    })))
    let group_bookids = {
        "æœªåˆ†ç»„": []
    }
    book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
        if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
        group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"].push(i.book_id)
    })
    
    if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
    
    let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 200)
    let urls = []

    book_ids.forEach(i => {
        urls.push(getServerHost() +"/detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
    })
    
    res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

    let resp = {book_info: []}
    res.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
    })

    return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
    let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
        "bookmall/tab",
        "version_name=5.8.9.32",
        null,
        ck
    )
    let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
    let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
    if (!tab) tab = []
    let bookList = []
    for (let i of tab) {
        bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    }
    return { book_info: bookList }
}

function normalizeResponse(data) {
    if (data.book_info) return data.book_info;
    if (data.data && data.data.book_info) return data.data.book_info;
    if (data.data && Array.isArray(data.data)) return data.data;
    if (data.list) return data.list;
    if (data.book_list) return data.book_list;
    if (data.data && data.data.publication_list) return data.data.publication_list;
    if (data.result) return data.result;
    if (data.data && data.data.result) return data.data.result;
    if (data.data && data.data.cell_view && data.data.cell_view.book_data) {
        return data.data.cell_view.book_data;
    }
    if (data.data && data.data.records) return data.data.records;
    if (data.data && data.data.list) return data.data.list;
    return [];
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) {
    result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
} else if(/read_history/.test(baseUrl)) {
    bid = getBookIdFull(result);
    id_list = splitArray(bid, 200);
    let urls = [];
    id_list.forEach(i =>{    	urls.push("https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=" + i.join(","))
    });
    let resp = {book_info: []}
    urls.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(java.ajax(r)).data)
    })
    result = resp;
} else {
    let w = baseUrl.split("/")
    if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
        result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
    } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
        result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
    } else {
        result = JSON.parse(result)
        if (result.data && result.data.data) {
            result = {book_info: result.data.data}
        }
    }
}

let normalizedData = normalizeResponse(result);

JSON.stringify({data: normalizedData})
</js>

let tjurl = result.tjurl;
let source = result.source;
let book_url = result.book_url;
let title = result.title || result.book_name;
let book_id = result.book_id || result.series_id;

let detail = {
    source: source,
    url: book_url,
    name: title
};

if (tjurl && tjurl.trim() !== "") {
    let sourceMatch = tjurl.match(/source=([^&]*)/);
    let urlMatch = tjurl.match(/url=([^&]*)/);
    let nameMatch = tjurl.match(/name=([^&]*)/);
    
    detail.source = sourceMatch ? sourceMatch[1] : "";
    detail.url = urlMatch ? urlMatch[1] : java.base64Encode(tjurl.trim());
    detail.name = nameMatch ? nameMatch[1] : "";
} 
else if (book_id && /^\d{19}$/.test(book_id)) {
    detail.url = java.base64Encode(`https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=${book_id}`);
    detail.source = "ç•ªèŒ„å°è¯´";
} else if (book_url) {
    detail.url = java.base64Encode(book_url);
}

let yunurl = java.base64Encode(JSON.stringify(detail));
`data:detailsUrl;base64,${yunurl},{"type":"qingci"}`;

let res = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
let catalog = {
    source: res.source,
    url: res.url,
    name: res.name,
    tab: res.tab || "novel"
};

var tabTips = {audio: 'å¬ä¹¦', video: 'è§†é¢‘', comic: 'æ¼«ç”»'}; 
if (tabTips[catalog.tab]) {
    java.toast('å½“å‰ä¸º' + tabTips[catalog.tab] + 'æ¨¡å¼');
}

let op = {
    method: "POST",
    body: {
        source: catalog.source,
        url: catalog.url,
        name: catalog.name
    }
};

let catalogUrl = getServerHost() +`/catalog,${JSON.stringify(op)}`;
let response = java.ajax(catalogUrl);

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

let device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';

if (device == 'android') {
    var typeMap = {audio:32, comic:64};
    book.type = catalog.tab in typeMap ? typeMap[catalog.tab] : 8;
} else {
    var typeMap = {audio:1, comic:2, video:3};
    book.type = catalog.tab in typeMap ? typeMap[catalog.tab] : 0;
}

JSON.parse(response).data.map((x) => {
    const isFanqieApp = ['ç•ªèŒ„å°è¯´', 'ç•ªèŒ„çŸ­å‰§', 'ç•ªèŒ„å¬ä¹¦', 'ç•ªèŒ„ç•…å¬'].includes(catalog.source);
    const urlToMatch = x.url || catalog.url;
    const bookId = urlToMatch.match(/book_id=(\d{19})\b/)?.[1] || null;
    const itemId = urlToMatch.match(/item_id=(\d+)/)?.[1] || null;
    
    let contentUrl = getServerHost() + `/chapter?cid=${x.cid}&source=${catalog.source}`;
    
    if (!isFanqieApp) {
        contentUrl += `&url=${catalog.url}`;
    } else {
        contentUrl += `&book_id=${bookId}&item_id=${itemId}`;
        
        if (['ç•ªèŒ„å¬ä¹¦', 'ç•ªèŒ„ç•…å¬'].includes(catalog.source)) {
            const toneId = Number((source.getLoginInfoMap())['å¬ä¹¦AIéŸ³è‰²ç¼–å·']) || 1;
            contentUrl += `&tone_id=${toneId}`;
        }
    }
    
    if (catalog.source == 'ç•ªèŒ„å°è¯´') {
        const commentPart = `{"js":"book ? result : '${getServerHost()}/comment?sessionid=${getSessionId()}&item_id=${itemId}&book_id=${bookId}'"}`;
        x.url = `${contentUrl},${commentPart}`;
    } else {
        x.url = contentUrl;
    }
    
    return x;
});
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "ç¬¬ä¸€å·ï¼šé»˜è®¤"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = source.bookSourceUrl +  `/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleExplore.bookUrl:
<js>
let tjurl = result.tjurl;
let source = result.source;
let book_url = result.book_url || result.url;
let title = result.title || result.book_name;

let detail = {
    source: source,
    url: book_url,
    name: title
};

if (tjurl && tjurl.trim() !== "") {
    let sourceMatch = tjurl.match(/source=([^&]*)/);
    let urlMatch = tjurl.match(/url=([^&]*)/);
    let nameMatch = tjurl.match(/name=([^&]*)/);
    
    detail.source = sourceMatch ? sourceMatch[1] : "";
    detail.url = urlMatch ? urlMatch[1] : java.base64Encode(tjurl.trim());
    detail.name = nameMatch ? nameMatch[1] : "";
} 
else if (book_url) {
    detail.url = java.base64Encode(book_url);
}

let yunurl = java.base64Encode(JSON.stringify(detail));
`data:detailsUrl;base64,${yunurl},{"type":"qingci"}`;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
let catalog = {
    source: res.source,
    url: res.url,
    name: res.name,
    tab: res.tab || "novel"
};

var tabTips = {audio: 'å¬ä¹¦', video: 'è§†é¢‘', comic: 'æ¼«ç”»'}; 
if (tabTips[catalog.tab]) {
    java.toast('å½“å‰ä¸º' + tabTips[catalog.tab] + 'æ¨¡å¼');
}

let op = {
    method: "POST",
    body: {
        source: catalog.source,
        url: catalog.url,
        name: catalog.name
    }
};

let catalogUrl = getServerHost() +`/catalog,${JSON.stringify(op)}`;
let response = java.ajax(catalogUrl);

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

let device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';

if (device == 'android') {
    var typeMap = {audio:32, comic:64};
    book.type = catalog.tab in typeMap ? typeMap[catalog.tab] : 8;
} else {
    var typeMap = {audio:1, comic:2, video:3};
    book.type = catalog.tab in typeMap ? typeMap[catalog.tab] : 0;
}

JSON.parse(response).data.map((x) => {
    const isFanqieApp = ['ç•ªèŒ„å°è¯´', 'ç•ªèŒ„çŸ­å‰§', 'ç•ªèŒ„å¬ä¹¦', 'ç•ªèŒ„ç•…å¬'].includes(catalog.source);
    const urlToMatch = x.url || catalog.url;
    const bookId = urlToMatch.match(/book_id=(\d{19})\b/)?.[1] || null;
    const itemId = urlToMatch.match(/item_id=(\d+)/)?.[1] || null;
    
    let contentUrl = getServerHost() + `/chapter?cid=${x.cid}&source=${catalog.source}`;
    
    if (!isFanqieApp) {
        contentUrl += `&url=${catalog.url}`;
    } else {
        contentUrl += `&book_id=${bookId}&item_id=${itemId}`;
        
        if (['ç•ªèŒ„å¬ä¹¦', 'ç•ªèŒ„ç•…å¬'].includes(catalog.source)) {
            const toneId = Number((source.getLoginInfoMap())['å¬ä¹¦AIéŸ³è‰²ç¼–å·']) || 1;
            contentUrl += `&tone_id=${toneId}`;
        }
    }
    
    if (catalog.source == 'ç•ªèŒ„å°è¯´') {
        const commentPart = `{"js":"book ? result : '${getServerHost()}/comment?sessionid=${getSessionId()}&item_id=${itemId}&book_id=${bookId}'"}`;
        x.url = `${contentUrl},${commentPart}`;
    } else {
        x.url = contentUrl;
    }
    
    return x;
});
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));

//ä¸‹ä¸€é¡µåˆ—è¡¨
t=[];
//ä¸‹ä¸€é¡µurlå½¢æˆå€¼
ne="";
//å˜é‡æ¯”è¾ƒå€¼
cmpnum=cmpVariable();

//iqupuç«™ç‚¹ç›®å½•ä¸‹ä¸€é¡µè§„åˆ™
if(baseUrl.indexOf("iqupu")>0){
	
		allNum=parseInt(java.
			          getString("$.data.count"));
		nowNum=parseInt(baseUrl.
     	      match(/\d*}/)[0].replace("}",""));
		if(nowNum*20<allNum){
			  if(nowNum<=cmpnum||cmpnum==0){
			  	  ne=baseUrl.
			  	     replace(/\d*}/,String(++nowNum)+'}');

			}))

	}
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var arr = baseUrl.split('/');
var songtype = arr[3];
var songid = arr[4].split('.')[0];
/*
var data = java.ajax("http://service.5sing.kugou.com/song/getSongUrl?version=6.6.70&songid=" + songid + "&songtype=" + songtype);
data = JSON.parse(data).data
data.squrl || data.hqurl || data.lqurl;
*/
	
let params = {
  appid: 3146,
  clienttime: Math.ceil(Date.now() / 1000),
  clientver: 610850,
  dfid: "-",
  from: "com.sing.client.player",
  mid: 114514,
  songfields: "ID,SN,SK,SW,SS,ST,SI,CT,M,S,ZQ,WO,ZC,HY,YG,CK,D,RQ,DD,E,R,RC,SG,C,CS,LV,LG,SY,UID,PT,SCSR,SC,KM5",
  songid: songid,
  songtype: songtype,
  token: "",
  userfields: "ID,NN,I,YCRQ,FCRQ",
  uuid: "-"
}

let signstr = ""
let keys = Object.keys(params).sort()
for (let i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
  signstr += `${keys[i]}=${params[keys[i]]}`
}
let signature = java.md5Encode("UqgPMZpjgRZQ7s8JAuUIP5DQdo5O5NB" + signstr + "UqgPMZpjgRZQ7s8JAuUIP5DQdo5O5NB")

let querys = []
for (let i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
  querys.push(`${keys[i]}=${params[keys[i]]}`.replace(/\,/g, "%2c"))
}
let querystr = querys.join("&") + "&signature=" + signature
let request = java.ajax("https://5sapi.kugou.com/song/getSongUrl?" + querystr)
// java.log(request)
let data = JSON.parse(request).data
data.squrl || data.squrl_backup || data.hqurl || data.hqurl_backup || data.lqurl || data.lqurl_backup
</js>

<js>
let d = JSON.parse(result);
let limit = Number(baseUrl.match(/limit=(\d+)/)[1]);
let commentTotal  =  Number(java.getString("$.data.commentTotal"));
let page = Math.ceil(commentTotal/limit);
let p = (Number(baseUrl.match(/offset=(\d+)/)[1])/limit)+1;
function getPlainText(cl) {
    let output = "";
    let cllen = cl.length;
    let sss = String(source.getVariable());
    let re = /^([\[\]æ©˜ç³–ç´«ç³–]|å—‘åˆ°äº†|kswl|\d+\.\d+\.\d+|[1234567890ä¸€äºŒä¸‰å››äº”å…­ä¸ƒå…«ä¹å]+åˆ·|æ‰“å¡)+$|ä¸ºè¥é€ æ›´å¥½çš„è¯„è®ºç¯å¢ƒï¼Œ/;
    let sre = sss.match(/å±è”½ã€(.*?)ã€‘/)?.[1] ?? null;
    sre = sre ? new RegExp(sre.replace(/,/g, '|'), 'g') : null;    
    let plen = 0;
    let validCount = 0;

    for (let i in cl) {
        let c = cl[i];
        let reply = (c?.replyAll ?? c?.reply);
        let rl = [];
        if (re.test(c.commentBody ?? c.commentbody) || (sre ? sre.test(c.commentBody ?? c.commentbody) : null)) {
            cllen--;
            plen++;
            continue;
        }
        
        // å¤„ç†å›å¤
        let replyTotal = Number(c.replyTotal);
if(replyTotal > 5 && /â—ç¼“å­˜å›å¤/.test(sss)) { 	
	let replyUrl = "https://android.jjwxc.net/comment/getReplyList";   
    let offset = 5;
    let limit = replyTotal; 
    let replyBody = `versionCode=444&novelId=${c.novelId}&chapterId=${c.chapterId}&commentId=${c.commentId}&offset=${offset}&limit=${limit}&isBackend=2&token=${getToken()}`;
        let replyPost = {
            "method": "POST",
            "body": replyBody
        }
        let replyList = java.ajax(replyUrl+","+JSON.stringify(replyPost));     
        replyList = JSON.parse(replyList).data;
        reply = reply.concat(replyList);                  
    }


        for (let j in reply) {
            let r = reply[j];
            if (re.test(r.replyBody ?? r.commentbody) || (sre ? sre.test(r.replyBody ?? r.commentbody) : null)) {
                continue;
            }
            
            let authorTag = (r?.isAuthor === "1" ? "ğŸ‘‘" : "ğŸ“œ")+r.floor+"æ¥¼ ";
            
            rl.push({
                text: `${authorTag} ${r.replyAuthor ?? r.commentauthor} (${(!r.comment_date_time ? undefined : java.timeFormat(r.comment_date_time *1000)) ?? (r.replyDate || r.commentdate)})\n ${replaceEmoticons(r.replyBody ?? r.commentbody)}`
            });
        }
                               
        // æ„å»ºä¸»è¯„è®º
        let authorTag = "";
        if (c?.isAuthor === "1") {
            authorTag = "ğŸ‘‘";
        } else if (c?.bulletinComment === "1") {
            authorTag = "ğŸ“¢";
        } else {
            authorTag = "ğŸ‘¤";
        }

        // ä¸»è¯„è®ºå¤´éƒ¨ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä½œè€…ã€æ—¶é—´ã€è®¢é˜…ã€äº’åŠ¨æ•°æ®ï¼‰
             
        let header = `${authorTag} ${c.commentAuthor ?? c.commentauthor} `;
        let time = ` ğŸ“†${(!c.comment_date_time ? undefined : java.timeFormat(c.comment_date_time * 1000)) ?? (c.commentDate || c.commentdate || '')}`
        // è®¢é˜…ä¿¡æ¯     
        if (c.subscriptionicon) {
            if (c.subscriptionrate) {
                header += ` ğŸ“–${c.subscriptionrate}`;
            } else if (c.subscriptionicon.includes("rate_novelallbuy")) {
                header += ` ğŸ“–100%`;
            }
        }

        // äº’åŠ¨æ•°æ®
        header += ` \nğŸ‘${c.agreenum ?? "0"}`;
        if (c.commentMark) header += ` â­ï¸${c.commentMark}`;
        
        output += "\n"+header + time+ "\n";
        output += `${replaceEmoticons(c.commentBody ?? c.commentbody)}`;




        // å›å¤å†…å®¹
        if (rl.length > 0) {
            output += "\n‎\nğŸ” å›å¤å†…å®¹:\n";
            rl.forEach(reply => {
                output += `  ${reply.text}\n`;
            });
        }
        if(replyTotal > 5 && !/â—ç¼“å­˜å›å¤/.test(sss)){
        output= output.replace(/\n$/,'')+getImage(replyTotal,c.novelId,c.chapterId,c.commentId)
        }
	
        output += "\n‎\n";
        validCount++;
    }

    // æ·»åŠ ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
    let stats = `ğŸ·æœ¬ç« å…±æœ‰${commentTotal}æ¡è¯„è®º | å…±æœ‰${page}é¡µ\nğŸ’¬å½“å‰ç¬¬${p}é¡µæ˜¾ç¤º ${validCount} æ¡è¯„è®º | å±è”½ ${plen} æ¡è¯„è®º`;
      
    return stats + "\n\n" + output;
}
let msg = d?.data.commentTotal?null:d.message;
if(msg){
	java.toast(msg);
}else{
result = getPlainText(d.data.commentList);
if(/\d+-\d+/.test(book.getVariable("custom"))){
     if(/offset=0/.test(baseUrl)&&!/1-\d+/.test(book.getVariable("custom"))){
     	result = ""
     	}
}
result.replace(/</g,'<')
.replace(/>/g,'>')
}
</js>

	}

function parseCategory(data) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow] = data.split(separator);
  
  const fullUrl = /^\d+|natural/.test(url) 
    ? `http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%22${url}%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148`
    : url;
  
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

function createFlexBox(title, url, num) {
  const flexBasisMap = { 1: 1, 2: 0.4, 3: 0.25, 4: 0.2, 5: 0.15, 7: 0.1, 10: 0.05 };
  return {
    title,

    }
  };
}

function removeDuplicatedParagraphs(text, chapterTitle) {
    var paragraphs = text.split('\n');
    var firstParagraph = paragraphs[0].trim();
    var containsSpecialChar = firstParagraph.includes('â—');
    var targetIndex = containsSpecialChar ? 1 : 0;
    var targetParagraph = paragraphs[targetIndex].trim();
    var lastChar = targetParagraph.charAt(targetParagraph.length - 1);
    var isPunctuation = /[â€”â€”â—ã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿï¼Œï¼›ï¼šã€\.\?!,;:ã€‹ ã€‘ï¼‰â€â€™â€¦~"'\)]/.test(lastChar);
    
    if (!isPunctuation) {
        for (var char of chapterTitle) {
            if (targetParagraph.includes(char)) {
                if (char === ' ' || char === 'â˜ª') continue;
                java.log("åˆ é™¤å½“å‰æ®µè½ï¼š"+targetParagraph)
                java.log("å½“å‰ç« èŠ‚åï¼š"+chapterTitle)
                java.log("ç›¸åŒæ–‡å­—ï¼š"+char)
                paragraphs.splice(targetIndex, 1);
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    return paragraphs.join('\n');
}
